items.question: What is the purpose of this bounty?
items.answer: The purpose of this bounty is to resolve a critical issue related to address display in the transaction history of Litewallet, an iOS crypto wallet powered by the Litecoin Foundation. The issue involves certain types of addresses not being displayed correctly due to a bug concerning UnsafeMutablePointer.

items.question: What is the main problem this bounty aims to address?
items.answer: The main problem is the incorrect display of certain types of addresses within the transaction history. Regular addresses are shown as expected, but others with ltc1, M, or ltc1 prefixes are not visible. The suspected cause is related to changes in how UnsafeMutablePointers are handled.

items.question: What are the key objectives of this bounty?
items.answer: The key objectives of this bounty include investigating and understanding the issue, identifying and fixing the root cause of the UnsafeMutablePointer failure, conducting thorough testing to ensure the problem is resolved with no regression issues, and creating clear and comprehensive documentation outlining the changes made.

items.question: What skills and expertise are required to participate?
items.answer: Participants should have proficiency in C, Swift, and SQLite, familiarity with the loafwallet-core library, and experience in iOS app development.

items.question: How will participants be rewarded?
items.answer: Participants will be rewarded from the LTC (Litecoin) donated to the bounty. The first successful submission that resolves the issue will win the bounty.

items.question: Where can I find more details and submit my application?
items.answer: You can find more details about the bounty and submit your application by reviewing [GitHub Issue #207](https://github.com/litecoin-foundation/litewallet-ios/pull/211). Be sure to check the project's specific contact email or application portal for submission.

items.question: What is the deadline for this bounty?
items.answer: The deadline for this bounty is not specified in this document. Please refer to [GitHub Issue #207](https://github.com/litecoin-foundation/litewallet-ios/pull/211) or the project's official communication channels for the most up-to-date information on the deadline.

items.question: How can I contact the project team for inquiries or application submission?
items.answer: To contact the project team for inquiries or to submit your application, please refer to the contact email or application portal provided in [GitHub Issue #207](https://github.com/litecoin-foundation/litewallet-ios/pull/211) or the project's official communication channels.
